## Source: ossf-package-analysis (cf97c6a167662f11bb874f05f30d15f1666631f719cbfee2485d3df20dbd569f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@callcenter-frontend/helpers' @ 99.0.2025091-3.11 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
